scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, including a bearded man with a cross on his forehead and several other men, stand on the left. On the right, an angel with large wings is depicted administering something from a chalice to a kneeling man. The background consists of stylized clouds and a textured ground.
scene_interpretation: The scene likely depicts a sacrament or a divine intervention, possibly the Last Supper or a similar event involving the Eucharist, given the presence of the chalice and the kneeling figure. The bearded figure with the cross might represent Christ or a saint. The angel's action suggests a spiritual blessing or administration of grace.
